name: Add numbers to texts
description:
Create numbered lists easily.


Usage instructions: select some text layers then go to the menu > "plugins" > "Add numbers to texts".


Featuring:

* Numbers

* Alphabetical numbering

* Roman numerals

* Re-use current text

* Numbering direction: bottom to top, top to bottom, left to right, right to left


Advanced usage:

* Type $nnn (multiple n's) to zero-pad the number

* Sequences of custom text

* Math expressions

- Use n for the number of the text

- Use round(random(10)) for a random number
